title: Andy Dalton released by Bengals...Best Landing Spot: Patriots, Jaguars, another team? (Football 4/30)
description:
This episode is an ode to both Andy Dalton and John Breech. The Bengals released their longtime quarterback on Thursday morning and it took us hours to get in contact with Cincy fan Breech...But now we're able to present this bonus episode, breaking down Dalton's tenure (1:00) and where he could be headed next (15:00). We highlight the good that Dalton was able to accomplish while also pointing out his and the team's shortcomings. Which landing spot makes the most sense? It might not be the teams at the top off the odds list (Jaguars/Patriots).
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @JohnBreech, @seanjwagner

itunes:title: Andy Dalton released by Bengals...Best Landing Spot: Patriots, Jaguars, another team? (Football 4/30)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Now that Joe Burrow is a Bengal, it was just a matter of time before the team parted ways with Andy Dalton. That day came today and the Pick Six crew is here to break down the move and what's next for the now on-the-market QB.
